unittitle_ssm: Clifford Ball photographs of the Pieter Claesen Wyckoff House and the Wyckoff-Bennett Homestead
abstract_ssm: The Clifford Ball photographs of the Pieter Claesen Wyckoff House and the Wyckoff-Bennett Homestead consist of 48 color photographic prints and one black-and-white copy print of an illustration documenting historic Dutch Colonial style houses in Brooklyn. The photographs were taken by Clifford Ball from March 1982 to 1983.
